channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16666] Add append and remove peer namespaces cmds for replication
item.description: After HBASE-16447, we support replication by namespaces config in peer. Like append_peer_tableCFs and remove_peer_tableCFs, I thought we need two new shell cmd: append_peer_namespaces and remove_peer_namespaces. Then we can easily change the namespaces config.
item.summary: Add append and remove peer namespaces cmds for replication

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

This message was automatically generated.

+    def append_peer_namespaces(id, namespaces)

The above method should be named add_peer_namespaces() since Set is used underneath.

Looks good overall.
